snippet: Roger Federer beat the wild card Peter Polansky, 6-2, 6-0, in the second round of the Rogers Cup in Toronto, and Ernest Gulbis, Richard Gasquet and Fabio Fognini also advanced in the United States Open tuneup.
abstract: Roger Federer beats wild card Peter Polansky in second round of Rogers Cup; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer beat the wild card Peter Polansky, 6-2, 6-0, in the second round of the Rogers Cup in Toronto, and Ernest Gulbis, Richard Gasquet and Fabio Fognini also advanced in the United States Open tuneup.
